extendedInfo.description: *** What is Random Mate? ***There are about 7,000,000,000 of people living on the earth.But the number of people who you can talk to and meet in your whole life is very littlebut, before you enjoy it!It helps you be able to meet and talk to people randomly, who can be living in an opposite to you.whenever, wherever, whoever don't matter with it.Just do itRight now!**** little information for this app ****This app is little different with msn, yahoo, google messenger and kakao talk. those are for talking to people added in my list. but this app is for talking to unknown people.It can be another way for communication like twitter or facebook.we'll make a video for how to use it on youtube.if you want to know about it, gmail us.

reviews.title: I like it buuut..
reviews.comment: It seems to just randomly mess up and then I can\'t even see the messages I\'ve gotten!..but it\'s good I guess
reviews.author: Heyyo EightyFour

reviews.title: App keep failing
reviews.comment: I have had to reinstall this app again for the third time in a month after it crashed and wouldnt connect to the network and everytime  I do i loose all convos
reviews.author: Bart Simpson

reviews.title: just a few tweaks
reviews.comment: the app is fine... But I wish there was a way to not have to have a response from the person you\'re speaking with in order to send another message to them...other than that I\'ve talked to really good people and had good conversations
reviews.author: michael thomas

reviews.title: Suggestions for a near perfect app
reviews.comment: I constantly want 3 new features: Inbox Filters (such as gender), Send new message to people in a custom Age Range (like the gender functionality), and an in-app camera.  Best chat app out there, but it can be improved!
reviews.author: Kenneth Palmer

reviews.title: Used to work
reviews.comment: Used to work great on my of RAZR but doesn\'t seem to work at all on my RAZR Max HD unless I leave the app open and keep clucking received
reviews.author: Shawn Elliott

reviews.title: Going down
reviews.comment: I used to like it a lot, but recently it\'s been infested with scammers, luring you to cam sites, to steal your information and resources.
reviews.author: Daniel Street

reviews.title: help
reviews.comment: you have to add a Help documentation to the application... What Gone means? - there is a problem: many times the message doesnt sent, even the internet is very good signal. - why cannot I send 2 messages at continuesly?? may I will descipe my sent photo!!
reviews.author: Esmaeel Qashalla

reviews.title: Bekah
reviews.comment: This is so good! I love this app. I use it a lot and its good because you can write your own messages rather than waiting for somebody to find you!
reviews.author: Rebekah Collins

reviews.title: Love this app
reviews.comment: Great app. Lots of different people to chat to about everything and anything you can imagine.  Only thing is that it\'ll be good if it got landscape view. As typing in portrait can be a pain in the backside and makes lots of mistakes.  I do anyway. ..lol
reviews.author: Alex S

reviews.title: love it
reviews.comment: i loved it but lately i have observed that thr is no one using this app. because i hv been sending msgs but do not get any reply back ...i guess something is wrong now
reviews.author: ryan singh

reviews.title: Hide massage
reviews.comment: I pressed hide to someone that I really likes  by mitake and we cant talk now ! U should add something to brieng the hiden massages !
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Crap
reviews.comment: This app gets your number and Spammers call you. Detected by McAfee Security app.
reviews.author: Kevin M.

reviews.title: It\'s fun but...
reviews.comment: When I can send messages and chat it\'s fun. but very often my messages will have trouble being sent, even while sitting in full service. Fix that and add a gender filter to the mailbox, a age group filter for inbox and to send messages to, and possibly add a profile picture then it\'ll be a truly wonderful app. Thanks.
reviews.author: Shinigami Pariah

reviews.title: I love it buuut...
reviews.comment: It needs more ways to filter. I get lots of the wrong sex and way out of my age bracket. It has to be said full of foreigners that barely speak english and pedophiles looking for pic trading of minors as well with no way to report. It is beyond disturbing. Being able to filter by age, country, sex would make it perfect, I have met some really cool people though, you just have to sift through a sea of perverts to get to them. Be wary who you give your info to!!
reviews.author: Sarah Brendle

reviews.title: Device compatibility?
reviews.comment: I like this app, but I\'ve noticed a few issues I\'d love to see updated.  1. messages always say 1 sec ago, 1 day ago, or gone. They never have a regular update or show how long ago the last message was recieved  2. There is no horizontal use. If I open the app with my keyboard out or open it during use, the app crashes.  3. The app disables spell check and auto correction  4. Sometimes it fails to update for new messages at all.   Otherwise I like it.
reviews.author: Dylan Grimes

reviews.title: Nice app.
reviews.comment: I\'ve met some of my best friends on this app. Built relationships with 2 people that I think will last for years, hopefully life. But be careful, there are a lot of sick people on here as well as a lot of nice ones. I\'d just advise you keep your kids away from the app. There should be an 18+ restriction. And I\'ve received some pretty sick pics just by asking what someone looks like so be wary of opening pics and maybe add an option to block ppl with multiple reports?
reviews.author: Billy Hann

reviews.title: Not bad
reviews.comment: The concept is AMAZING but there are many glitches. At least on my phone its stuck on portrait so its almost impossible to type on the tiny keyboard so PLEASE add landscape support. It Also Automatically Capitalizes Every Word Like This And Its Freaking Annoying. Fix that, fix the translation and make it so that we can msg people multiple times without them replying and you will have a true 5 star app.
reviews.author: Bojan Neskovski

reviews.title: Hi
reviews.comment: This is a cool app,kik me at bigb8937
reviews.author: Brandon Jester

reviews.title: Really good app..
reviews.comment: ..there is just one problem. Message sending, it would be great to send many messages at the same time instead of waiting that other one to reply..
reviews.author: Oona Jouste
